choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear Mr. [Last Name],

I hope this message finds you well. 

It's with great regret that I must inform you of our recent decision regarding your upcoming leave from the company. As per our current work plan, we intend to take a break after today and will resume working only on Friday when my annual review meeting is scheduled at 1:00 PM. We understand this may be disruptive for some of our colleagues but believe that it would allow us to prioritize tasks pertaining to the upcoming projects or initiatives you are leading.

We greatly appreciate your understanding and support during these challenging times, especially in light of recent developments regarding COVID-19 pandemic. We will continue monitoring our company's digital footprint regularly for any signs that there is a potential risk to the health of employees or the overall business. 

In case you have any concerns about this decision, please feel free to contact me directly and we can discuss it further. I am confident that your team members would appreciate having their time dedicated more effectively towards the ongoing objectives at hand. Please also note that our company is committed to ensuring a safe work environment for all its employees during these times of crisis.

Thank you once again for your understanding and support in this transition period. I am looking forward to hearing from you soon about any possible adjustments or opportunities we may be able to make use of while remaining fully committed to the mission at hand. 

Best regards,
[Your Name]
